config: Ladies and gentlemen, ghouls and goblins, on the enchanting October 31st, we gathered for the Justia Ghoulie Awards, an eagerly expected highlight in our calendar. Once again, you, our incredible participants, brought the house down with stunning costumes and spooktacular displays. Your boundless creativity and unwavering enthusiasm continue to astound us, and we can't wait to see what the future holds for this beloved Justia tradition. Congratulations to our well-deserving top vote-getters, and let the celebration of Halloween-loving hearts continue!
